title: My Experience Contributing to Open Source Projects
featured-image-alt: people sitting around a table during a meeting
teaser: I've been busy this year contributing to open source projects.  I wanted to share my experience with this important professional activity.

title: How to Create a Featured Image Template for a Jekyll Blog Site
featured-image-alt: a camera on a stand pointing toward a mountain
teaser: This brief tutorial reviews how to create a blog post featured image template file for the Jekyll static site generator platform.

title: Are You Thinking About Your Map Users
featured-image-alt: people crossing a street in a city
teaser: When we are designing maps for print, or building custom geoprocessing tools, are we thinking about the people who will use these?  Are we looking at the map under the same conditions users will?
